mapper.insert: insert all into schedule (sseq, seq, startdate, enddate, originpicture, savefolder, savepicture, persons, thema) values (schedule_seq.nextval, #{seq}, to_date(#{startdate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{enddate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{originpicture}, #{savefolder}, #{savepicture}, #{persons}, #{thema}) into board (seq, bcode, userid, subject, content, logtime, updatetime, recommcount, wishcount, hit) values (#{seq}, #{sbcode}, #{userid}, #{ssubject}, #{scontent}, sysdate, sysdate, 0,0,0 ) select * from dual
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert all into board (seq, bcode, userid, subject, content, logtime, updatetime, recommcount, wishcount, hit) values (#{seq}, #{bcode},#{userid}, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, 0,0,0 ) into location (seq, location, lat, lng, address, simpleaddr) values (#{seq}, #{location}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{address}, #{simpleaddr}) into schedule_board (sseq, seq, tripday, step) values (#{sseq}, #{seq}, #{tripday}, #{step}) select * from dual
mapper.select: select sseq, b.seq, startdate, enddate, originpicture, savefolder, savepicture, persons, thema, enddate - startdate + 1 as period, bcode, userid, subject, content, logtime, updatetime, recommcount, wishcount, hit from schedule s, board b where s.seq=b.seq and sseq=#{sseq}
select * from schedule_board where sseq=#{sseq} order by tripday, step
select * from board b, location l, schedule_board sb where b.seq=l.seq and b.seq=sb.seq and b.seq=#{seq}
